revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=AKiTio |model=MyCloud |revision=Mini (AK-MCS-LN2SPS) |upc=610074719892 |ean=4715104310035 |asin=B00R5ZW358;GB;, B005XDGJB8;DE; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=inXtron |type=NAS |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.35 |cpu1_brand=PLX Technology |cpu1_model=NAS7821 |cpu1_cspeed=750 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27UF082G2B-TPCB |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G831CFP-S6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J7 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211D |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=8-bit OTP Microcontroller;Holtek;HT48R05A-1;;1;,,, Serial Real Time Clock;STMicroelectronics;M41T0;;1;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;CYStech Electronics;MTB20N03Q8;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Linear Technology;LT1117;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.2; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.14;Fedora release 12; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:01:D2 }} {{TagLine|Personal Cloud Server}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.akitio.com/network-storage/mycloud-mini}} "MP-LN23P-RS-V1.01" and "E10-70G4153002" :are silkscreened on the board in FCC photos. *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/akitio/akitio_mycloud_mini ''AKiTio MyCloud Mini'' on '''OpenWrt''' HWData] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[PLX Technology]] NAS7821 :ARM11MP Core @750MHz *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Storage: 256MB (SLC NAND) Flash, :1x SATA (int.), 1x eSATA (ext.) ports *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 5V, 2A via barrel ===See also=== *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 10G (T3NA)]] - Thunder3 10G Network Adapter • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/11526/akitio-displays-thunderbolt-3-to-10gbe-adapter PR] :Thunderbolt 3 ([[Intel]]/[[Aquantia]] ??), 10GbE RJ-45, 1G/2.5G/5G/10G *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 Duo Pro (T3DP)]] - Thunder3 & USB 3.1 DAS • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/10248/thunderbolt-3-in-action-akitio-thunder3-duo-pro-das-review Review] :2x Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C), 1x USB 3.1 Gen 1, DisplayPort 1.1 • [https://www.akitio.com/desktop-storage/thunder3-duo-pro PPage] *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 PCIe SSD (T3PC)]] - Thunder3 PCIe SSD DAS • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/10396/akitio-thunder3-pcie-ssd-thunderbolt-das-review Review] :2x Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C), PCIe 3.0 x4 NVMe, DisplayPort 1.1 • [https://www.akitio.com/expansion/thunder3-pcie-ssd PPage] *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 PCIe Box (T3PB)]] - Thunder3 PCIe Box DAS • [https://www.akitio.com/expansion/thunder3-pcie-box PPage] :2x Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C), PCIe 3.0 x4 (x16), DisplayPort 1.1 ==Images== ---- File:AKiTio MyCloud Mini Top.jpeg|Board Top File:AKiTio MyCloud Mini Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:AKiTio MyCloud Mini Aux.jpeg|Auxillary Board [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
